data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Ahmadabad, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ahmadabad, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 79,356 believers in Ahmadabad against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.section_summary: On average, 15 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Ahmadabad, Gujarat, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Ahmadabad.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Ahmadabad, Gujarat, India be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Kanchan (Hindu traditions) people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Kanchan (Hindu traditions) people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Kanchan (Hindu traditions) people is yours.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Ahmadabad.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Ahmadabad who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the county of Ahmadabad, Gujarat, India has a population of 7,214,200.

We estimate Ahmadabad has 79,356 people who might know Jesus, 87,532 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7,047,312 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 79,356 believers in Ahmadabad to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.
